'''Tuff stairs''' are a [[tuff]] variant of [[stairs]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Tuff stairs can be mined using any [[pickaxe]]. If mined without a pickaxe, they drop nothing.

{{Breaking row|Tuff Stairs|Pickaxe|Wood|horizontal=1}}

=== Crafting ===
{{Crafting
|A1 = Tuff
|A2 = Tuff |B2 = Tuff

|type= Building block
}}

== Usage ==
{{for|information about the placement mechanics of all stairs|Stairs#Usage}}

=== Note blocks ===
Tuff stairs can be placed under [[note block]]s to produce "bass drum" sounds.
